I am an associate professor at the University of Nevada, Reno. My research centers on spatiotemporal population dynamics, ecological diffusion, and forecasting under uncertainty.

- **Methods:** hierarchical Bayesian models, reaction–diffusion PDEs, MCMC  
- **Software:** R (EcoDiffusion), C++ accelerators, PyTorch prototypes  
- **Systems:** sage-grouse, sea otters, shrubland ecosystems

If you’re interested in collaboration, mentoring, or speaking, feel free to reach out: [perryw@unr.edu](mailto:perryw@unr.edu).
